The movie is lame mix of futile teen comedy and horror. That's truly awful enough for a start, but the director goes even further with lameness as throwing in various right-wing/patriotic lines in such already disastrous mix. There's lots of urban "humor" combined with suggestive nationalist pseudo-mythology and there's so many desperate tries with even more fails at giving this garbage some kind of social commentary value. There's some people who praise it for it's camp value, but guess what? There's no fun, the movie just plods from fail to fail. The acting is so forgettable and unconvincing, as there's not even a single scene with deep or even real emotions or expressiveness, so the characters are defined just visually. Cool camera and professional mainstream production can't save this movie, as it's totally dire and pointless in itself.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1746,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

Sarajevski atentat
programme.desc: Directed by Fadil Hadzic. With Lucyna Winnicka, Bert Sotlar, Predrag Finci, Svetolik Nikacevic. A resistance fighter in WW2 Sarajevo is running from the Gestapo and finds shelter in the home of the old man. The old man is a former member of the Mlada Bosna organization and tells the young man about his youth and events that which led to assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand in Sarajevo.

He lives a carefree life of a Belgrade dandy boy, neglecting his girlfriend, avoiding his draft calls, and refusing to deal with any life responsibility in general. programme.title: Tesna koza
Tesna koža
programme.desc: Tesna koza: Directed by Milivoje 'Mica' Milosevic. With Nikola Simic, Milan 'Lane' Gutovic, Rahela Ferari, Ruzica Sokic. In this light, fluffy comedy, a low-level clerk cannot make ends meet because his brood is in no way economically cooperative: his daughter is a lawyer looking for work, unsuccessfully; his son is a would-be astronomer who wants to spend his life studying without working; and his other son wants his own wheels. It is enough to send a father to the lottery, or to the soccer pool." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0084780/","name":"Tesna koza","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgzZTViYTgtMGM0MC00Y2NmLWJlYWQtMWFjNzNlMmQ0YTAxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTgxOTUwMTI@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Comedy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799509/","name":"Nikola Simic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0349664/","name":"Milan 'Lane' Gutovic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272194/","name":"Rahela Ferari"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0590525/","name":"Milivoje 'Mica' Milosevic"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0034971/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071363/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0667637/","name":"Ljiljana Pavic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0667641/","name":"Sinisa Pavic"}],"datePublished":"1982-09-24","description":"In this light, fluffy comedy, a low-level clerk cannot make ends meet because his brood is in no way economically cooperative: his daughter is a lawyer looking for work, unsuccessfully; his son is a would-be astronomer who wants to s","keywords":"lawyer,clerk,wages,slacker,motorcycle","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0084780/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dima-12"},"dateCreated":"1999-11-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Highest Grossing Yugoslav movie ever","reviewBody":""Tesna koza" is an urban satire directed by one of the Yugoslav most commercial filmmakers Mica Milosevic who was specialized in comedy.The movie still holds the title of Yugoslav highest grossing feature."Tesna koza" had over million viewers in theatrical release in ex-Yugoslavia which is a great result if we know that ex-Yugoslavia had a population of 20 million in all. The movie has a cult following in Bulgaria and ex-USSR. The comedy itself strictly focuses on satirizing the Serbian mentality.The whole movie is full of hillarious one-liners that are,unfortunately,funny only to Yugoslavs.The style of script is strictly American and the mentioned style is of comic book origin. This means that characters are described not only through what they do but also through their whole appearance and looks. Simic is fine as the clerk who has lots of problems while Gutovic's performance is hillarious in the role of Simic's boss. Lots of bad taste is fortunately covered lots of laughs and thus "Tesna koza" still remains as the monument of Yugoslav commercial cinema...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3077,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0084780, Title: Tesna koza, --- Description: Tesna koza: Directed by Milivoje 'Mica' Milosevic. With Nikola Simic, Milan 'Lane' Gutovic, Rahela Ferari, Ruzica Sokic. In this light, fluffy comedy, a low-level clerk cannot make ends meet because his brood is in no way economically cooperative: his daughter is a lawyer looking for work, unsuccessfully; his son is a would-be astronomer who wants to spend his life studying without working; and his other son wants his own wheels. The movie has a cult following in Bulgaria and ex-USSR. The comedy itself strictly focuses on satirizing the Serbian mentality.The whole movie is full of hillarious one-liners that are,unfortunately,funny only to Yugoslavs.The style of script is strictly American and the mentioned style is of comic book origin. This means that characters are described not only through what they do but also through their whole appearance and looks. Simic is fine as the clerk who has lots of problems while Gutovic's performance is hillarious in the role of Simic's boss. Lots of bad taste is fortunately covered lots of laughs and thus "Tesna koza" still remains as the monument of Yugoslav commercial cinema...","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3077,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"duration":"PT1H32M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lager Nis
Lager Niš
programme.desc: Directed by Miomir 'Miki' Stamenkovic. With Svetislav 'Bule' Goncic, Milan Strljic, Miodrag 'Miki' Krstovic, Tanasije Uzunovic. The tragic story of a group of prisoners, ordinary people, were detained in the camp at Lager in Naise at the beginning of WWII, after that mighty torture and abuse by the Germans, will try escape from the camp. A few succeeded.

programme.title: Anđeosko srce
programme.desc: Harry Angel (Mickey Rourke) je privanti detektiv koji primi neobičan telefonski poziv. Naime, dojavljeno mu je da ispita sotonistčki kult u Harlemu. Harry Angel (Mickey Rourke) je privanti detektiv koji primi neobičan telefonski poziv. Naime, dojavljeno mu je da ispita sotonistčki kult u Harlemu gdje nepoznati muškarac želi razgovarati s njim. Čovjek se zove Louis Cyphre i traži od Harryja da mu nađe nestalu osobu. Harry za pet tisuća dolara prihvaća posao i slijedi trag označen mnogobrojnim leševima. Harryja će istraga iz New Yorka odvesti u Louisianu, gdje u hotelu susreće mladu ženu tajanstvene prošlosti Epiphany Proudfoot, s kojom se upušta u ljubavnu vezu. Iako je upozoren da se ne miješa ondje gdje mu nije mjesto, Harry ne odustaje i sve se dublje upleće u mračnu priču zabranjenih rituala voodoo kulta...

credits.actor: Gregory Harrison, Robert Collins, Rebecca Jenkins, Steve Whistance-Smith, Nahanni Johnstone, Maury Chaykin

programme.title: Hide and Seek

programme.desc:

window","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0382077/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"drownnnsoda"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Top Notch Acting In A Good Suspense-Mystery.","reviewBody":""Hide and Seek" is one of the best horror films I've seen in awhile. It is about a psychologist, David Callaway (Robert DeNiro) whose wife commits suicide, and he decides to move to upstate New York with his daughter, Emily (Dakota Fanning), whose personality has severely changed after her mother's death. A family friend/psychologist/co-worker of David, Katherine (Famke Janssen) disagrees with David's decision to move, and thinks that Emily should stay where she is. Then after David and Emily move into their new house, David meets Elizabeth (Elisabeth Shue), who becomes a friend to David and Emily. Then strange things begin to happen - Emily discovers a new imaginary friend, Charlie. And then people start to die. 

Robert DeNiro and Dakota Fanning are both brilliant, their performances were extremely real and convincing. Dakota is quite talented for her age, and DeNiro gives another great performance like he always does. Famke Janssen ("Don't Say A Word" and "House on Haunted Hill") also does great, and Elisabeth Shue ("The Karate Kid") is also very good. In fact, the whole cast was great. The whole film was really suspenseful, and it tricks you a lot. The atmosphere was heavy, I loved the whole feeling of the secluded upstate New York small-town, and the large house David and Emily move into. 

I liked this movie because it was more psychological rather than chop and slash gore that most horror films use to scare people. "Hide and Seek" has a good, solid story behind it, which is why it is such a good horror film, and the acting is top notch on top of it all. I don't understand everyone's problem with this movie, it was actually quite good. Sure, the ending is a little cliché, but the rest of the movie was good enough on it's own. 8/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":82572,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

Notch Acting In A Good Suspense-Mystery.","reviewBody":""Hide and Seek" is one of the best horror films I've seen in awhile. It is about a psychologist, David Callaway (Robert DeNiro) whose wife commits suicide, and he decides to move to upstate New York with his daughter, Emily (Dakota Fanning), whose personality has severely changed after her mother's death. A family friend/psychologist/co-worker of David, Katherine (Famke Janssen) disagrees with David's decision to move, and thinks that Emily should stay where she is. Then after David and Emily move into their new house, David meets Elizabeth (Elisabeth Shue), who becomes a friend to David and Emily. Then strange things begin to happen - Emily discovers a new imaginary friend, Charlie. And then people start to die. 

Robert DeNiro and Dakota Fanning are both brilliant, their performances were extremely real and convincing. Dakota is quite talented for her age, and DeNiro gives another great performance like he always does. Famke Janssen ("Don't Say A Word" and "House on Haunted Hill") also does great, and Elisabeth Shue ("The Karate Kid") is also very good. In fact, the whole cast was great. The whole film was really suspenseful, and it tricks you a lot. The atmosphere was heavy, I loved the whole feeling of the secluded upstate New York small-town, and the large house David and Emily move into. 

I liked this movie because it was more psychological rather than chop and slash gore that most horror films use to scare people. "Hide and Seek" has a good, solid story behind it, which is why it is such a good horror film, and the acting is top notch on top of it all. I don't understand everyone's problem with this movie, it was actually quite good. programme.title: Conspiracy Theory
Teorija zavjere
programme.desc: Conspiracy Theory: Directed by Richard Donner. With Mel Gibson, Julia Roberts, Patrick Stewart, Cylk Cozart. A taxi driver with a penchant for conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of these theories turns out to be true. Ironically, he loves government employee Alice Sutton(played by Julia Roberts) from afar. One day, their worlds collide when one of Jerry's theories seems to be true, as he becomes the target of assassination, and Alice helps him to go on the run from the unknown government forces. He thinks that Dr. Jonas(Patrick Stewart) will help him, but it turns out that was one conspiracy he didn't anticipate...\n\nEntertaining thriller is well directed by Richard Donner, with a good pace and reasonably believable story, though it does go on a bit too long, and becomes a bit too convoluted, but otherwise this film works well, and some of Jerry's theories may not be so nutty anymore...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":95519,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

An Olympic gold medalist escapes to freedom in the US, only to be tracked down by his sadistic ex-coach." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0110805/","name":"Pentathlon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzEwMjBhMDQtZjFiOC00ZDU1LWEyZDYtYTg4MmZkNzZiMDRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDI4NjM1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000185/","name":"Dolph Lundgren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0815800/","name":"David Soul"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0171187/","name":"Renée Coleman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0540330/","name":"Bruce Malmuth"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049954/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050338/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024884/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0821132/","name":"William Stadiem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0540330/","name":"Bruce Malmuth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567771/","name":"Gary T. McDonald"}],"datePublished":"1994-07-08","description":"An Olympic gold medalist escapes to freedom in the US, only to be tracked down by his sadistic ex-coach.","keywords":"olympics,racism,communist,pentathlon,gold medal","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0110805/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"movieman_kev"},"dateCreated":"2004-04-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"those Kooky Commies","reviewBody":"While at the Olympics, Eric Brogar (Dolph Lundgren) escapes communist West Germany & flees to America. But after hearing that the no-goodniks have killed his father, he starts on a downward spiral until Creese (Roger "T.C." Mosley), his burger manager, starts training him for the Olympics again. Then Mueller (David "Hutch" Soul), Eric's commie former-trainer shows up. Will Eric prevail and find true love with Julia (Renee "Evil leaper from Quantum Leap" Colemen)? This film was overall enjoyable to me for some reason. Not great, mind you, but enjoyable as a time-waister. The acting's servicable enough. 

My Grade: C

abroad","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0073018/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"orthodoxhedonist"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gritty Street-Wise Cop Action With Teeth","reviewBody":"The French Connection and its sequel are the Grandfather to such classics as To Live and Die in L.A., Copland, and Narc, and the anti-thesis of all of those 80's flops either far too "Hollywood" or far too "by the book". Hackman is still the "knock down, drag out", shoot first ask later 2-fisted narc that doesn't know what Miranda means that he was in part I, but with a change of scenery that takes him across the pond. The terrain has changed, but the raw unadulterated character acting of Hackman still makes it one hell of a roller coaster ride.\n\nRife with dirty cops, drug smugglers, and French thugs, this movies direction and writing reminds instantly that it is part of the production catalyst that would later see series like The Shield have such success in prime time TV. The 70's rarely pulled punches when it came to top billed cop movies, starting with Dirty Harry, the original French Connection and then snowballing into classics like Serpico. The French Connection II is no exception. This movie won't disappoint any fan of either the original, or anyone that wanted to see for themselves Gene Hackman carrying a lead action role almost through the screen.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17205,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit II
Smoki i Bandit 2
programme.desc:
Smokey and the Bandit II: Directed by Hal Needham. With Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Jerry Reed, Dom DeLuise. The Bandit goes on another cross-country run, transporting an elephant from Florida to Texas. And, once again, Sheriff Buford T. Justice is on his tail." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0081529/","name":"Smokey and the Bandit II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmFhMGQ5NTEtMTE3Zi00YjBlLWI0OTItNDQwNGVkNWU5MmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000608/","name":"Burt Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001276/","name":"Jackie Gleason"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0715274/","name":"Jerry Reed"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0624102/","name":"Hal Needham"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047780/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0624102/","name":"Hal Needham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506597/","name":"Robert L. Levy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069547/","name":"Jerry Belson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2523708185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzhkOTg2ZjctZDYxMS00YjU5LWJhMDgtZDYyYjg3NzJkNjU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzhkOTg2ZjctZDYxMS00YjU5LWJhMDgtZDYyYjg3NzJkNjU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"datePublished":"1980-08-15","description":"The Bandit goes on another cross-country run, transporting an elephant from Florida to Texas. And, once again, Sheriff Buford T. Justice is on his tail.","keywords":"sheriff,road movie,elephant,car crash,trucker","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0081529/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"billybrown41"},"dateCreated":"2002-07-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"What went wrong here?","reviewBody":"I know I've mentioned before that I wasn't even going to bother writing a review for this one, but here it is: I've always wanted to like this movie. I really have. Being an enormous fan of the first, and even finding some enjoyment from the third, I still can't say I like this one. I don't know what happened here. Everyone was back, inculding the director, they had the money to back it up, and they still couldn't get it right. What made this film so atrocious? Well, I have to blame it on the writers. I also have to blame the rest of the cast for going along with it. Seriously, when the characters behave NOTHING like they did in the original and the objective is to haul an elephant(!), you know you're in trouble. I cringed every time Frog and the Bandit squabbled and I cringed whenever the Bandit would lose his cool and do something stupid. I mean, what happened to the mild-mannered, likeable, laid-back country boy that we all knew and loved from the first one? Why in the HELL did they have to make him into and alcoholic, washed-up, ego-maniac? I don't know how, but they managed to make him into one of the most unlikeable protagonists in cinematic history. There's even a ridiculous training scene where the Snowman and Frog whip the bandit back into shape to make the big run. I guess it was supposed to be funny. I found it to be a slap in the face. Sometimes Hollywood really has me scatching my head. 

Now, for the Justices. Two words: Good grief. They made them even dumber than in the first, and while there are a few funny lines, it goes into overdrive and messes the whole thing up. Another thing, Buford's Canadian cousin (I forget his name) was a disgrace. Was he supposed to be gay? If so, that wasn't funny either.

I guess I've trashed this one enough. On the bright side, there were a few moments that made me giggle, but I can't remember the scenes to save my life. Please, if you consider yourself a fan of the first, avoid this one. Save yourself a lot of disappointment."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15034,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

I really have. Being an enormous fan of the first, and even finding some enjoyment from the third, I still can't say I like this one. I don't know what happened here. McDonald"}],"datePublished":"1994-07-08","description":"An Olympic gold medalist escapes to freedom in the US, only to be tracked down by his sadistic ex-coach.","keywords":"olympics,racism,communist,pentathlon,gold medal","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0110805/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"movieman_kev"},"dateCreated":"2004-04-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"those Kooky Commies","reviewBody":"While at the Olympics, Eric Brogar (Dolph Lundgren) escapes communist West Germany & flees to America. But after hearing that the no-goodniks have killed his father, he starts on a downward spiral until Creese (Roger "T.C." Mosley), his burger manager, starts training him for the Olympics again. Then Mueller (David "Hutch" Soul), Eric's commie former-trainer shows up. Will Eric prevail and find true love with Julia (Renee "Evil leaper from Quantum Leap" Colemen)? This film was overall enjoyable to me for some reason. Not great, mind you, but enjoyable as a time-waister. The acting's servicable enough. 

My Grade: C

Trailer for this classic sequel"},"datePublished":"1975-05-21","description":""Popeye" Doyle travels to Marseille to find Alain Charnier, the drug smuggler who eluded him in New York.","keywords":"organized crime,drug traffic,detective,sequel to best picture winner,american abroad","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0073018/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"orthodoxhedonist"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gritty Street-Wise Cop Action With Teeth","reviewBody":"The French Connection and its sequel are the Grandfather to such classics as To Live and Die in L.A., Copland, and Narc, and the anti-thesis of all of those 80's flops either far too "Hollywood" or far too "by the book". Hackman is still the "knock down, drag out", shoot first ask later 2-fisted narc that doesn't know what Miranda means that he was in part I, but with a change of scenery that takes him across the pond. The terrain has changed, but the raw unadulterated character acting of Hackman still makes it one hell of a roller coaster ride.\n\nRife with dirty cops, drug smugglers, and French thugs, this movies direction and writing reminds instantly that it is part of the production catalyst that would later see series like The Shield have such success in prime time TV. The 70's rarely pulled punches when it came to top billed cop movies, starting with Dirty Harry, the original French Connection and then snowballing into classics like Serpico. The French Connection II is no exception. This movie won't disappoint any fan of either the original, or anyone that wanted to see for themselves Gene Hackman carrying a lead action role almost through the screen.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17205,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Smoki i Bandit 2
programme.desc: Bandit se vratio, u nešto drugačijem izdanju. Naime, Bandit je u međuvremenu postao alkoholičar kog je Keri, njegova dotadašnja devojka, ostavila. Ipak, kada mu bogata braća, Mali i Veliki Enos,... Bandit se vratio, u nešto drugačijem izdanju. Naime, Bandit je u međuvremenu postao alkoholičar kog je Keri, njegova dotadašnja devojka, ostavila. Ipak, kada mu bogata braća, Mali i Veliki Enos, ponude posao, on i njegov stari, dobri kolega Kledis, bez razmišljanja prihvataju. Umesto piva, sada treba da prevezu - slona! Jedini "problem" je u tome što je u pitanju slonica, koja svaki čas treba da se porodi. Pojavljuje se i šerif Baford koji nije zaboravio poniženja koja su mu priredila Kledis i Bandit tokom prethodne akcije.

programme.title: The Krays
Braća Krej
programme.desc:
The Krays: Directed by Peter Medak. With Billie Whitelaw, Tom Bell, Gary Kemp, Martin Kemp. This fact-based movie follows the life of the twin crime-lords in London's '60s underworld." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0099951/","name":"The Krays","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxZWI0NDQtMDkyNC00NDgzLTkyNWItZDUzNTY3ZjRkYTBjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyOTc@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447290/","name":"Gary Kemp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447337/","name":"Martin Kemp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925794/","name":"Billie Whitelaw"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0575389/","name":"Peter Medak"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0244432/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0025709/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106172/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0726000/","name":"Philip Ridley"}],"datePublished":"1990-04-27","description":"This fact-based movie follows the life of the twin crime-lords in London's '60s underworld.","keywords":"proles,gangster,real life siblings as fictional siblings,cockney,brutality","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0099951/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chrisow"},"dateCreated":"2001-07-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"What a big disappointment","reviewBody":"This looked like a promising film: a portrait of Britain's most feared gangsters with great performances and some stylish,but graphic violence.

 How wrong I was.

 True, the violence was graphic etc but the film was let down by a script which ignores facts and skims over certain characters eg Teddy Smith, Inspector ''Nipper'' Reid.

 Also, most of the film was focused on the family. True, the Kray brothers were mummy's boys, but we got the point in the first ten minutes. The film sticks with this and does not paint a portrait of the terror they created and an authentic picture of British gangland. Plus,the acting wasn't the best, except for Gary Kemp as Ronnie.

Watch Gangster No.1 . That was how this film should have been.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7854,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

horror flick","reviewBody":"Watched it last night, with pretty much no great expectations of it. Maybe a scare or too, but I really was expecting poor acting. Yet, to my surprise the movie holds its own very nicely. Good acting by all, the girls were cute, with some decent nudity as well, which always adds a little to a good horror flick. The best thing about this movie was its ability to use Paranoia. Not necessarily the Hitchcock form, but still for a big budget horror movie, its vibe and atmosphere is very solid. I found myself being a little scared, for no apparent reason, which is a good thing for a horror/slasher to do. overall, good movie, good young acting, great scares, and just a cool movie to chill and watch with some friends. check it out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37071,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

U... Tatica i sin, Veliki i Mali Enos, unajmljuju Kletusa da im od Majamija do Teksasa preveze kopiju ajkulinih čeljusti koja bi trebalo da im posluži kao dobra reklama za njihov novi riblji restoran. U igri je veliki novac i važno je da se sve odradi u nemoguće kratkom roku. Međutim, Baford Ti Džastis zameniće Kletusa sa njegovim starim poznanikom Banditom, i tada jurnjava počinje...

poverty-stricken Sioux reservation.","keywords":"murder investigation,buddy cop,modern western,fbi agent,native american","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0105585/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"barrwell"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"reasons you will love this enlightened modern western","reviewBody":"This is one of my personal favorites. I gave it a 9 as I don't think that it's a perfect film, though it is very close. The acting is great and it's heart is in the right place. There are dozens of plot descriptions available here, so i will just tell you why you might love this film....


* a very honest and realistic portrayal of native Americans (by native Americans, like the excellent Graham Greene from 'Dances with Wolves').



* excellent location cinematography, it was filmed in the badlands.



* one of the most satisfying climactic scenes ever....it really feels good.



* the film has a fairly strong anti-government sentiment to it...(if you're all gung-ho for the US government, this film may not be for you).



* Thunderheart is based on actual events that happened on Pine Ridge Reservation in the 1970s. John Trudell, who plays Jimmy Looks-twice (the FBIs main suspect), was actually there! He is a real real-life Sioux activist whose character is loosely-based on Leonard Peltier. 


Some other quick tidbits, look for David Crosby of Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young as a bartender in the bar room scene. I love the allegorical last shot of the film with Ray (Val Kilmer) in his car. Very fitting...which way to go? The whole film fits perfectly and usually I will say that many films wont appeal to every taste, however in the case of Thunderheart I will say this ....I don't know one person whose opinion I value who doesn't like this movie!

further note: If you like this one try watching the 1970 classic 'Little Big Man'.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14521,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Crveni mesec
programme.desc: Ljubavna, ali i snažna istorijska priča koja se tiče svih nas, smeštena je u period od avgusta 1913, nakon pobede Srbije u Balkanskim ratovima kada je povratila deo teoritorije, do kraja 1915. godine,... Ljubavna, ali i snažna istorijska priča koja se tiče svih nas, smeštena je u period od avgusta 1913, nakon pobede Srbije u Balkanskim ratovima kada je povratila deo teoritorije, do kraja 1915. godine, kada je austrougarska vojska okupirala Beograd. Glavni junak, mladi srpski oficir, vraća se sa ratišta u rodnu kuću. Svadba mu je, tradicionalno, već zakazana, ali zaplet priče počinje kada ćerka austrougarskog poslanika, koju igra Ivana Dudić, "baci oko" na njega. Nedopustivo za to vreme, koketna mlada dama, ne krije svoja osećanja. Rasplet njihove ljubavne drame (koja je plod mašte autora) odvija se u realnom istorijskom periodu pred Veliki rat, pa se u scenariju pojavljuje još dvadesetak glavnih likova, uglavnom stvarnih istorijskih ličnosti. Biće tu dramatičnih događanja, špijunskih intriga, diplomatskih nadmudrivanja, političkih spletki i prevara...

programme.title: Crveni mesec
programme.desc: Ljubavna, ali i snažna istorijska priča koja se tiče svih nas, smeštena je u period od avgusta 1913, nakon pobede Srbije u Balkanskim ratovima kada je povratila deo teoritorije, do kraja 1915. godine,... Ljubavna, ali i snažna istorijska priča koja se tiče svih nas, smeštena je u period od avgusta 1913, nakon pobede Srbije u Balkanskim ratovima kada je povratila deo teoritorije, do kraja 1915. godine, kada je austrougarska vojska okupirala Beograd. Glavni junak, mladi srpski oficir, vraća se sa ratišta u rodnu kuću. Svadba mu je, tradicionalno, već zakazana, ali zaplet priče počinje kada ćerka austrougarskog poslanika, koju igra Ivana Dudić, "baci oko" na njega. Nedopustivo za to vreme, koketna mlada dama, ne krije svoja osećanja. Rasplet njihove ljubavne drame (koja je plod mašte autora) odvija se u realnom istorijskom periodu pred Veliki rat, pa se u scenariju pojavljuje još dvadesetak glavnih likova, uglavnom stvarnih istorijskih ličnosti. Biće tu dramatičnih događanja, špijunskih intriga, diplomatskih nadmudrivanja, političkih spletki i prevara...

programme.desc:
The Andromeda Strain: With Benjamin Bratt, Christa Miller, Louis Ferreira, Ricky Schroder. Strain","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwMDM0NzUyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODk5MTE3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000973/","name":"Benjamin Strain","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi513653785","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmNiOWY3N2UtN2ViYS00MDZiLTk2MjQtYWE1MTAwNWJjOWFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmNiOWY3N2UtN2ViYS00MDZiLTk2MjQtYWE1MTAwNWJjOWFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Andromeda Strain"},"datePublished":"2008-05-26","description":"A crack team of top scientists work feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what has killed the citizens of a small town and learn how this deadly contagion can be stopped.","keywords":"female surgeon,crying man,no cell phone signal,anthropogenic disaster,gay character","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0424600/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"siderite"},"dateCreated":"2008-06-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is the MTV version","reviewBody":"During the late sixties, Michael Crichton wrote a novel about contamination with an alien microorganism. At that time, science was hailed as the pinnacle of human achievement and it was thought that anything is possible. Therefore it is normal for the book and the subsequent film from 1971 to focus on the science, on the formalism, on the way people think their way out of a situation.

Fast forward to 2008. People are dumber, science is a joke, people need to look good and the design must be perfect. Some horrible deaths and some fear of government conspiracy or terrorism is the only way tension can be achieved.

The problem is that I have anticipated this. My own theory says that if you expect it to happen, there won't be a negative response, yet I am terribly angry at this mini series BECAUSE it was exactly what I expected. Things have been added to the original story that make no sense and make no sense to add: government black ops, wormholes, message from the future, ecological controversy over ocean vent mining, etc, etc. As expected the effects were really good, the people looked good, the computer interface design was flawless. And it all fell completely empty.

If you are familiar to The Andromeda Strain book or 1971 movie, you might find it interesting to see how it can go horribly wrong. Otherwise, just watch the 1971 version. It is slow paced, faithful to the book and a lot more interesting.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13791,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2}}</script><metacontent="

small town and learn how this deadly contagion can be stopped.","keywords":"female surgeon,crying man,no cell phone signal,anthropogenic disaster,gay character","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0424600/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"siderite","dateCreated":"2008-06-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is the MTV version","reviewBody":"During the late sixties, Michael Crichton wrote a novel about contamination with an alien microorganism. At that time, science was hailed as the pinnacle of human achievement and it was thought that anything is possible. Therefore it is normal for the book and the subsequent film from 1971 to focus on the science, on the formalism, on the way people think their way out of a situation.

Fast forward to 2008. People are dumber, science is a joke, people need to look good and the design must be perfect. Some horrible deaths and some fear of government conspiracy or terrorism is the only way tension can be achieved.

The problem is that I have anticipated this. My own theory says that if you expect it to happen, there won't be a negative response, yet I am terribly angry at this mini series BECAUSE it was exactly what I expected. Things have been added to the original story that make no sense and make no sense to add: government black ops, wormholes, message from the future, ecological controversy over ocean vent mining, etc, etc. As expected the effects were really good, the people looked good, the computer interface design was flawless. And it all fell completely empty.

If you are familiar to The Andromeda Strain book or 1971 movie, you might find it interesting to see how it can go horribly wrong. Otherwise, just watch the 1971 version. It is slow paced, faithful to the book and a lot more interesting.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13791,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2</script><metacontent="

2019","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097138/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"uds3"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lord, forgive them, for they know not what they do!","reviewBody":"I love CYBORG, there isn't one intellectually stimulating moment during the entire 87 minutes (and 14 seconds actually..well on MY copy) That alone deserves recognition! But hey..Van Dumb WAS learning his craft here..it took another 27 movies before he mastered the art of screen inconsequentiality.

Cyborg is total fun. Where else ya gonna find a robotic damsel in distress, the good guy crucified without any lasting discomfort and the bad guy a vision in Armani leatherwork and wrap around Police sunglasses!

You can comfortably watch this movie......miss as much of it as you like while you cook dinner...and it makes not the slightest difference! I figure it was a class act! In MY book it beats the bejeesus out of THE ENGLISH PATIENT!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29671,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1190080/","name":"2012","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0MjEyODQzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTczMjQ4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000131/","name":"John Cusack"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0628601/","name":"Thandiwe Newton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252230/","name":"Chiwetel Ejiofor"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247168/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460057/","name":"Harald Kloser"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"2012: Final Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3444113945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0NDQ4MjE5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgzMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0NDQ4MjE5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgzMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An academic researcher leads a group of people in a fight to counteract the apocalyptic events that were predicted by the ancient Mayan calendar. "},"datePublished":"2009-11-11","description":"A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.","keywords":"apocalypse,earthquake,end of the world,elizabeth i character,juvenile bedwetting","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1190080/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eilfurz"},"dateCreated":"2009-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good cataclysmic Action, but waayyy to much bad kitsch","reviewBody":"I loved the first half of the movie with Roland Emmerich seemingly back to form (from his disastrous "10,000 B.C."). But as the movie drags on, even the smallest character gets his "i have to say goodbye to my loved ones"-scene - which becomes quite annoying after you've watched this for the 5th time in a row. then comes a great destruction scene and then we're back in soap-opera territory. don't get me wrong, basically that can be said about most of Emmerich's movies - they are just popcorn cinema - leave your brain at the ticket counter. still, i enjoyed the likes of "Independence Day" or even "The Day After Tomorrow". But the one thing, he can't do properly is "good"-emotional cinema - which works fine in some of his other movies when his pathos-laden, goofy dialogue writing doesn't get in the way of the big explosions - it fit's, makes them funnier to a point. unfortunately this doesn't work for 2012. if somebody could actually cut this movie down to 90minutes running time, i'd even be lining up for a second ticket.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":359402,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"duration":"PT2H38M"}</script><metacontent="

But as the movie drags on, even the smallest character gets his "i have to say goodbye to my loved ones"-scene - which becomes quite annoying after you've watched this for the 5th time in a row. then comes a great destruction scene and then we're back in soap-opera territory. don't get me wrong, basically that can be said about most of Emmerich's movies - they are just popcorn cinema - leave your brain at the ticket counter. still, i enjoyed the likes of "Independence Day" or even "The Day After Tomorrow". But the one thing, he can't do properly is "good"-emotional cinema - which works fine in some of his other movies when his pathos-laden, goofy dialogue writing doesn't get in the way of the big explosions - it fit's, makes them funnier to a point. unfortunately this doesn't work for 2012. if somebody could actually cut this movie down to 90minutes running time, i'd even be lining up for a second ticket.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":359402,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"duration":"PT2H38M"</script><metacontent="

back","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0400426/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lakic_matija"},"dateCreated":"2009-06-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is much better than Bloodrayne or Alone In The Dark","reviewBody":"I just watched the movie, and I played the game, and although little more than 50% is in common, Far Cry movie isn't that bad. It isn't a summer blockbuster, nor instant classic, but, it was never meant to be. It's a nice straight to DVD action flick which will give you 1,5h solid entertainment. Other than basic stuff (characters, name, enemies), movie is set on different location, and as much faster pacing. Action sequences are nice and solid, and effects are also good considering this is a low budget movie. But that's the point, it IS a low budget title, but looking at it it feels much more expensive. Script is OK, most of the time works well, and I have to say that Jack in the movie has a lot in common with game Jack. Both make fun of almost everything, and are more phlegmatic in nature. Val on the other hand isn't that action oriented as her game counterpart. Kier does very nice job bringing Dr. Krieger to life, and frankly, I like this one better. Nobody but Kier could portrait mad German scientist. The only thing about characters that kinda annoyed me is Jack's noticeable German accent, although Till did excellent Job for the performance part. The only major disappointment what I had with the movie is that location was changed from pacific sand beaches to rocky and cold bay like in western Canada/south Alaska. Considering the budget, I understand and forgive. Film is no award nominee nor winner, but a nice rental on a hot or rainy afternoon to fill a void and have house popcorn fun. 6/10 :) P.S. It's faaaar better than Bloodrayne or Alone In The Dark, seeing this will make you think that it wasn't directed by Boll.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13502,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.1},"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

nearby island.","keywords":"murderess,murder,woman murders a man,man tied up,tied back to back","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0400426/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"lakic_matija","dateCreated":"2009-06-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is much better than Bloodrayne or Alone In The Dark","reviewBody":"I just watched the movie, and I played the game, and although little more than 50% is in common, Far Cry movie isn't that bad. It isn't a summer blockbuster, nor instant classic, but, it was never meant to be. It's a nice straight to DVD action flick which will give you 1,5h solid entertainment. Other than basic stuff (characters, name, enemies), movie is set on different location, and as much faster pacing. Action sequences are nice and solid, and effects are also good considering this is a low budget movie. But that's the point, it IS a low budget title, but looking at it it feels much more expensive. Script is OK, most of the time works well, and I have to say that Jack in the movie has a lot in common with game Jack. Both make fun of almost everything, and are more phlegmatic in nature. Val on the other hand isn't that action oriented as her game counterpart. Kier does very nice job bringing Dr. Krieger to life, and frankly, I like this one better. Nobody but Kier could portrait mad German scientist. The only thing about characters that kinda annoyed me is Jack's noticeable German accent, although Till did excellent Job for the performance part. The only major disappointment what I had with the movie is that location was changed from pacific sand beaches to rocky and cold bay like in western Canada/south Alaska. Considering the budget, I understand and forgive. Film is no award nominee nor winner, but a nice rental on a hot or rainy afternoon to fill a void and have house popcorn fun. 6/10 :) P.S. It's faaaar better than Bloodrayne or Alone In The Dark, seeing this will make you think that it wasn't directed by Boll.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13502,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.1,"duration":"PT1H35M"</script><metacontent="

comics","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0081573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best Of The Superman Series","reviewBody":"This is the best of the Superman movies because of the three villains, played by Terrence Stamp, Sarah Douglas and Jack O'Halloran.

Those three are so good, particularly Stamp, that they make this easily the most memorable of the four films. The scenes with them on the moon, their first encounter on earth and their climactic fight against Superman in the skies above Metropolis are all outstanding.

Once again, Superman goes a little overboard in his romance to Lois Lane (do you believe some reviewers are upset there weren't explicit sex scenes in the film?) Hey, folks, it's just a comic book and it's supposed to be innocent, clean fun. Sorry that turns you off. For the rest of us, this is generally very enjoyable film from start to finish, with no real lulls.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":100089,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"duration":"PT2H7M"}</script><metacontent="

A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telepathic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087262/","name":"Firestarter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzFiZTQ4ZjQtNjgyZi00Yjc0LWI2Y2YtNjk0YzM3NWEwYjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001418/","name":"David Keith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428086/","name":"Freddie Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0504495/","name":"Mark L. Lester"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014380/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000175/","name":"Stephen King"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0542970/","name":"Stanley Mann"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Firestarter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3273564953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWUyZjAzOTktNGE5Yi00N2IzLTkxMzktNmRhYTI1MGVlOWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWUyZjAzOTktNGE5Yi00N2IzLTkxMzktNmRhYTI1MGVlOWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Firestarter"},"datePublished":"1984-05-11","description":"A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telepathic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.","keywords":"pyrokinesis,experiment,fire,psychic,doctor","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087262/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Michael_Elliott"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Cast but the Film is a Flop","reviewBody":"Firestarter (1984) 

** (out of 4) 

Weak adaptation of the Steven King novel about a young child named Charlie (Drew Barrymore) who has the special power of being able to set things on fire by just using her thought. She's on the run with her father (David Keith) from various government people wanting to exploit her talent as she tries to control her gift. I haven't read the novel that this movie is based on so I can't comment on what this got right or wrong. However, I'm one who never expects a movie to follow the book 100% so with that in mind I can only say that this film is a complete mess. Thankfully this thing offers up an all-star cast including some legends because without them this film would be nearly impossible to get through. Clocking in just under two-hours, the film feels twice as long and I think a lot of the blame has to go to director Mark L. Lester. His direction is all over the place and not for a second did I feel any tension in the story and I also thought the pacing was pretty bad. I will say that not all of this might be his fault because the screenplay itself has a fair number of problems. One such problem is that the entire thing never really seems to know what it wants to do. Is it a horror film? Science fiction? Is it trying to be some sort of hard, negative look at the government and their powers? The film is all over the map in regards to what it's trying to do but sadly it doesn't do any of them very well. The performances are actually pretty good and are the best thing in the film. Barrymore delivers a strong and believable performance as the haunting girl and I've always liked Keith in just about everything he's done. Heather Locklear does a nice job in her scenes as the mother and we get vets like Martin Sheen and George C. Scott offering up fine performances. The highlight of the film deals with a couple farmers played by Art Carney and Louise Fletcher. Yes, FIRESTARTER has three Oscar-winning actors. The special effects are another plus and help give the film some energy. I must admit that the entire story struck me as being silly and especially early on as we see Keith's character getting nosebleeds from doing his psychic powers and Barrymore crying from setting people on fire. These scenes really made me laugh the majority of the time and once we keep seeing the same thing over and over it just gets boring."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29941,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Muva
programme.desc: Set Brandl je naučnik potpuno posvećen svom istraživanju. I došao do neverovatnog otkrića - načina da materiju teleportuje kroz prostor. Set Brandl je naučnik potpuno posvećen svom istraživanju. Da bi sa svetom podelio svoja saznanja, u laboratoriju poziva novinarku Veroniku Kvajf. Set je zaista, došao do neverovatnog otkrića - načina da materiju teleportuje kroz prostor. Veronika nekoliko nedelja prati Setove eksperimente; njih dvoje se, neminovno, zbližavaju. Nenamerno, ona ga podstiče da svoje eksperimente proširi i na ljudska bića. Da bi se teleportovao kroz prostor, Set ulazi u svoju napravu neznajući da je sa njim ušla i jedna muva.

programme.title: Muva 2
programme.desc: Sin naučnika Seta Brundla, Martin, nastavlja tamo gde je njegov otac stao. Martin ima samo pet godina, ali zahvaljujući genima muve koje je nasledio od oca, izgleda kao odrastao čovek. Sin naučnika Seta Brundla, Martin (Erik Stolz), nastavlja tamo gde je njegov otac stao. Martin ima samo pet godina, ali zahvaljući genima muve koje je nasledio od oca, izgleda kao odrastao čovek.Celog života zatvoren je u labaratoriji "Bartok" korporacije, čiji zli predsednik(Li Ričardson) planira da napravi novu vrstu super muva. Martin, kao i otac, istražuje teleportaciju, nesvestan da će se, neminovno, transformisati u muvu.Kada to shvati, želi da se osveti Bartoku, ali i da pronadje partnerku sa kojim bi se razmnožio, uprkos neželjenim genima. "Muvu 2" režirao je Kris Valas koji je kreirao šminku i animacije u originalnom Kronebergovom horor klasiku.

credits.actor: Dolph Lundgren, Brian Benben, Betsy Brantley, Jim Haynie, David Ackroyd, Sherman Howard, Sam Anderson, Michael J. Pollard

"},"datePublished":"2012-05-10","description":"An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.","keywords":"vampire,camera shot of feet,foot closeup,female stockinged soles,female stockinged feet","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1077368/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alanbittencourtx"},"dateCreated":"2012-05-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Darkish","reviewBody":"I love Johnny Depp and I love Tim Burton. Together they can be sublime. Look at "Ed Wood" and "Sweeney Todd" Here, well here they seem kind of lost. Everything is in over the top tones without getting to the root of anything. The performances are shrill and disconnected with the exception of the wonderful Helena Bonham Carter. The script is underwritten and the story is tired and unconvincing but in the present film going landscape it is more enjoyable than most others. I'm tempted to advise Mr. Burton and Mr.Depp to be a bit more daring in their intentions. We're all aware of Burton's visual wizardry and of Depp's remarkable beauty and talent, why not put all that at the service of something meaningful?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":251745,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

","datePublished":"2012-05-10","description":"An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.","keywords":"vampire,camera shot of feet,foot closeup,female stockinged soles,female stockinged feet","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1077368/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alanbittencourtx","dateCreated":"2012-05-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Darkish","reviewBody":"I love Johnny Depp and I love Tim Burton. Together they can be sublime. Look at "Ed Wood" and "Sweeney Todd" Here, well here they seem kind of lost. Everything is in over the top tones without getting to the root of anything. The performances are shrill and disconnected with the exception of the wonderful Helena Bonham Carter. The script is underwritten and the story is tired and unconvincing but in the present film going landscape it is more enjoyable than most others. I'm tempted to advise Mr. Burton and Mr.Depp to be a bit more daring in their intentions. We're all aware of Burton's visual wizardry and of Depp's remarkable beauty and talent, why not put all that at the service of something meaningful?","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":251745,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"duration":"PT1H53M"</script><metacontent="

Not really...","reviewBody":"So, Prom Night was supposed to be a horror and thriller movie. I'm a big wuss and was scared to see this movie at the beginning, but upon seeing it, it is neither horror or thriller.

I was basically making fun of the movie in my seat because it was so predictable. You could predict what was going to happen next. The young actors were alright at playing their characters, but I'd have to say the killer was definitely at the top of the game - acting wise.

Yes, I'll give props for the plot because it was good, but it's not thrilling or scary. There were almost zero "jump-in-your-seat" scenes. So, don't waste ten dollars seeing it in theatres, wait 'til it comes to DVD.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34544,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.9},"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Underworld: Directed by Len Wiseman. With Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Michael Sheen, Shane Brolly. Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons." Trailer from Screen Gems"},"datePublished":"2004-01-07","description":"Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.","keywords":"vampire,vampire bite,blood,death,strong female character","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0320691/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"possiblegod"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ignore...","reviewBody":"Everything you've heard from the critics, everything you know about vampires and werewolves, everything that is standard in most fantasy/action films. Then you'll enjoy this film. I, unlike a lot of fans, will not claim that this is a move masterpiece, I will not claim that this will change movie making history. I, however, will go against the critics and say that this is a good film. Not getting a chance to see this in the cinema, when it came out on video I rented it out immediately. Now, at first, I could see what the critics meant it wasn't how the trailers depicted it and the script and acting in places was a bit rusty. I put it back and gave no more thought to it. However I soon found myself thinking about the film and the bits I'd enjoyed. I soon realised that this was good because it wasn't conventional and I couldn't stop thinking about it. There had been so many plot twists, so much to take in that I knew I had to see it a second time. This time I bought it, on DVD, and I found myself watching it again and again. This film gives you wonderful villains and just when you start to hate them something nastier comes along or they give you a motive which makes you confused. In one film the world which you are presented with at the beginning, Lycans (Werewolves) vrs. Vampires, is thrown into doubt. There are no longer good and evil, it is no longer this side versus this side and our hero Selene is stuck in the middle. The thing is every villain in this film seems to be fully justifiable in their actions yet completely nasty. I was trying, after falling in love with this film, to work out where it went wrong. I realised there was too much. You are thrown into this world and you have to keep up, there is no chance to sit down and work things out. That comes after seeing the film, this world explains itself through the characters actions. It is as if this world is real and we are meant to know about it already. Their is a history, their is a false history, their are legendary characters and not all of it is gone into in particular detail. Pieces of the world's history are just thrown in by the characters, as they would be in real life, with no long detailed explanation. That mixed with the cliff hanger ending, the promise of more characters from the past. MEans that even if you weren't sure about this film, the sequel Underworld: Evolution looks like it will be amazing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":256697,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Škola Crna rupa
programme.desc: Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi. Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi.

programme.title: Škorpija
programme.desc: Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine:... Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine: Tobi Kurtis (Eddie Kaye Thomas), fini bihevioralista; Hapi Kin (Jadyn Wong) vunderkind za mehaniku i Silvester Dod (Ari Stidham), odličan statističar. Iako se međusobno odlično razumiju, vanjski svijet je za njih zagonetka. Srećom, Pejdž Dinin (Katharine McPhee) ima mladog sina koji će ih "prevesti" u vanjski svijet. Svi pobjeđuju s ovim timom: svojom izuzetnom domišljatošću rješavaju nacionalne krize, pomažući sebi da se uklope u stvarni svijet.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Emmit Stussy, "kralj parkirališta Minnesote", zgodan je, samoostvareni mogul nekretnina sa savršenom porodicom, prava američka priča o uspjehu. Emmit Stussy, "kralj parkirališta Minnesote", zgodan je, samoostvareni mogul nekretnina sa savršenom porodicom, prava američka priča o uspjehu. Ray je više upozoravajuća priča. Umoran od života u Emmitovoj sjeni, Ray je proćelav, debeljuškast socijalni radnik koji je silno ogorčen kartama koje su mu podijeljene, a za to okrivljuje brata. Njihovo bratsko suparništvo vodi ih na krivi put koji počinje sitnim krađama, ali ubrzo dovodi do ubistava, mafijaša i surovog natjecateljskog bridža. Sitno suparništvo između dvojice braće eskalira i donosi haos maloj minesotskoj zajednici.

programme.title: Sajnfeld
programme.desc: Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta. Džeri je komičar koji ima najboljeg prijatelja, bivšu devojku koja mu postaje najbolja prijateljica i komšiju koji mu postaje deo života. Itekako mu ide sa ženama, ali nijedna mu ne odgovara: ili ima veliki nos, ili je prelepa, ali ne baš pod svakim svetlom itd...ali vremenom mu sve to postaje dosadno i odluči da menja svoj život.

credits.actor: Denis Leary, Michael Lombardi, Steven Pasquale, Andrea Roth, John Scurti, Daniel Sunjata, Callie Thorne, Natalie Distler

programme.title: Vrh Jezera
programme.desc: Nestanak trudne djevojčice unosi veliki nemir u stanovnike ostrva i detektivku koja je dobila slučaj... Tui Mitcham, 12-godišnja djevojčica do grla ulazi u ledeno jezero na Južnom ostrvu Novog... Nestanak trudne djevojčice unosi veliki nemir u stanovnike ostrva i detektivku koja je dobila slučaj... Tui Mitcham, 12-godišnja djevojčica do grla ulazi u ledeno jezero na Južnom ostrvu Novog Zelanda. Riječ je o kćerki mjesnog narkobosa, Matta Mitchama i njegove treće žene, saznaje se da je u petom mjesecu trudnoće nakon čega joj se gubi svaki trag. Robin Griffin je neiskusna detektivka koja dobija poziv da istraži Tuin slučaj. Kako raste njezina opsjednutost potragom i broj mještana koje ispituje, tako počinje shvaćati da joj je pronaći Tui jednako važno kao i pronaći samu sebe, sebe koju dobro skriva od očiju javnosti. Tuina priča je u Robinin život vratila dvojicu muškarca iz prošlosti...

programme.title: Biti Eve
programme.desc: Biti Eve je serija fokusirana na tinejdžerku, Evu Baxter i njene dnevne probleme. Njeni su roditelji razvedeni, ali žive jedno do drugog. Eve je bila zaljubljena u dječaka po imenu Adam, ali se ta... Biti Eve je serija fokusirana na tinejdžerku, Evu Baxter i njene dnevne probleme. Njeni su roditelji razvedeni, ali žive jedno do drugog. Eve je bila zaljubljena u dječaka po imenu Adam, ali se ta veza raspala. Ona završava sa jednim dečkom po imenu Sam Hooper, sa kojim se prvi put poljubila, još dok su bili djeca.

programme.title: Monk Mali Pas
programme.desc: Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli. Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos

programme.title: Škola Crna rupa
programme.desc: Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi. Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi.

programme.title: Škorpija
programme.desc: Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine:... Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine: Tobi Kurtis (Eddie Kaye Thomas), fini bihevioralista; Hapi Kin (Jadyn Wong) vunderkind za mehaniku i Silvester Dod (Ari Stidham), odličan statističar. Iako se međusobno odlično razumiju, vanjski svijet je za njih zagonetka. Srećom, Pejdž Dinin (Katharine McPhee) ima mladog sina koji će ih "prevesti" u vanjski svijet. Svi pobjeđuju s ovim timom: svojom izuzetnom domišljatošću rješavaju nacionalne krize, pomažući sebi da se uklope u stvarni svijet.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Emmit Stussy, "kralj parkirališta Minnesote", zgodan je, samoostvareni mogul nekretnina sa savršenom porodicom, prava američka priča o uspjehu. Emmit Stussy, "kralj parkirališta Minnesote", zgodan je, samoostvareni mogul nekretnina sa savršenom porodicom, prava američka priča o uspjehu. Ray je više upozoravajuća priča. Umoran od života u Emmitovoj sjeni, Ray je proćelav, debeljuškast socijalni radnik koji je silno ogorčen kartama koje su mu podijeljene, a za to okrivljuje brata. Njihovo bratsko suparništvo vodi ih na krivi put koji počinje sitnim krađama, ali ubrzo dovodi do ubistava, mafijaša i surovog natjecateljskog bridža. Sitno suparništvo između dvojice braće eskalira i donosi haos maloj minesotskoj zajednici.

programme.title: Sajnfeld
programme.desc: Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta. Džeri je komičar koji ima najboljeg prijatelja, bivšu devojku koja mu postaje najbolja prijateljica i komšiju koji mu postaje deo života. Itekako mu ide sa ženama, ali nijedna mu ne odgovara: ili ima veliki nos, ili je prelepa, ali ne baš pod svakim svetlom itd...ali vremenom mu sve to postaje dosadno i odluči da menja svoj život.

credits.actor: Denis Leary, Michael Lombardi, Steven Pasquale, Andrea Roth, John Scurti, Daniel Sunjata, Callie Thorne, Natalie Distler

Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta. Džeri je komičar koji ima najboljeg prijatelja, bivšu devojku koja mu postaje najbolja prijateljica i komšiju koji mu postaje deo života. Itekako mu ide sa ženama, ali nijedna mu ne odgovara: ili ima veliki nos, ili je prelepa, ali ne baš pod svakim svetlom itd...ali vremenom mu sve to postaje dosadno i odluči da menja svoj život.

credits.actor: Denis Leary, Michael Lombardi, Steven Pasquale, Andrea Roth, John Scurti, Daniel Sunjata, Callie Thorne, Natalie Distler

programme.title: Vrh Jezera
programme.desc: Nestanak trudne djevojčice unosi veliki nemir u stanovnike ostrva i detektivku koja je dobila slučaj... Tui Mitcham, 12-godišnja djevojčica do grla ulazi u ledeno jezero na Južnom ostrvu Novog... Nestanak trudne djevojčice unosi veliki nemir u stanovnike ostrva i detektivku koja je dobila slučaj... Tui Mitcham, 12-godišnja djevojčica do grla ulazi u ledeno jezero na Južnom ostrvu Novog Zelanda. Riječ je o kćerki mjesnog narkobosa, Matta Mitchama i njegove treće žene, saznaje se da je u petom mjesecu trudnoće nakon čega joj se gubi svaki trag. Robin Griffin je neiskusna detektivka koja dobija poziv da istraži Tuin slučaj. Kako raste njezina opsjednutost potragom i broj mještana koje ispituje, tako počinje shvaćati da joj je pronaći Tui jednako važno kao i pronaći samu sebe, sebe koju dobro skriva od očiju javnosti. Tuina priča je u Robinin život vratila dvojicu muškarca iz prošlosti...

programme.title: Biti Eve
programme.desc: Biti Eve je serija fokusirana na tinejdžerku, Evu Baxter i njene dnevne probleme. Njeni su roditelji razvedeni, ali žive jedno do drugog. Eve je bila zaljubljena u dječaka po imenu Adam, ali se ta... Biti Eve je serija fokusirana na tinejdžerku, Evu Baxter i njene dnevne probleme. Njeni su roditelji razvedeni, ali žive jedno do drugog. Eve je bila zaljubljena u dječaka po imenu Adam, ali se ta veza raspala. Ona završava sa jednim dečkom po imenu Sam Hooper, sa kojim se prvi put poljubila, još dok su bili djeca.

programme.title: Monk Mali Pas
programme.desc: Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli. Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos

programme.title: Škola Crna rupa
programme.desc: Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi. Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi.

programme.title: Škorpija
programme.desc: Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine:... Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine: Tobi Kurtis (Eddie Kaye Thomas), fini bihevioralista; Hapi Kin (Jadyn Wong) vunderkind za mehaniku i Silvester Dod (Ari Stidham), odličan statističar. Iako se međusobno odlično razumiju, vanjski svijet je za njih zagonetka. Srećom, Pejdž Dinin (Katharine McPhee) ima mladog sina koji će ih "prevesti" u vanjski svijet. Svi pobjeđuju s ovim timom: svojom izuzetnom domišljatošću rješavaju nacionalne krize, pomažući sebi da se uklope u stvarni svijet.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Emmit Stussy, "kralj parkirališta Minnesote", zgodan je, samoostvareni mogul nekretnina sa savršenom porodicom, prava američka priča o uspjehu. Emmit Stussy, "kralj parkirališta Minnesote", zgodan je, samoostvareni mogul nekretnina sa savršenom porodicom, prava američka priča o uspjehu. Ray je više upozoravajuća priča. Umoran od života u Emmitovoj sjeni, Ray je proćelav, debeljuškast socijalni radnik koji je silno ogorčen kartama koje su mu podijeljene, a za to okrivljuje brata. Njihovo bratsko suparništvo vodi ih na krivi put koji počinje sitnim krađama, ali ubrzo dovodi do ubistava, mafijaša i surovog natjecateljskog bridža. Sitno suparništvo između dvojice braće eskalira i donosi haos maloj minesotskoj zajednici.

programme.title: Sajnfeld
programme.desc: Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta.
